name: ShoppingMate App
description:
A browser-based shopping list app, which can be used to split the list. Shopping mates can select shopping aisle categories and tick off items at the same time.

PLEASE NOTE: Opening the app for the first time might take longer due to it being a free deployment which goes to sleep when it 's not in use. The same applies for the integrated background API.
